content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside on my patio watching the planes land at mccarran airport.  suddenly i saw a bright reflective shiny object shoot across the sky nw to se faster than anything i have ever seen.  it was very bright, like a star at night.  the sun was shining.  i have a tree in front of my patio and when it went behind the branches, i lost it.  it took a second or two for me to register what i might have seen.  either that or a meteorite?
content.summary: Shot across the sky

content.detailedDescription: This sighting occurred between 11:00 and 11:30 above durango colorado's valley. i was watch tv when i saw the large red flashing craft come over the west mountains from west to east, then after coming over the valley the craft looked lower than i initially thought, it changed course to south east and seemed to be dropping in altitude. it went out of sight after it seemed to be slowing down. the truly humbling event occurred just after the flashing red thing went out of view and i looked up at several (8-10) twinkling lights that slowly got brighter from nothing at all in a straight line across the sky from west to east. once these objects got brighter i noticed that they were actually moving and not stationary. they began to converge in a un-orderly and random fashion directly over where i saw the red craft flying. for about two minutes these twinkling crafts floated around to my south view occasionally shooting in one direction and then turning around, some were just stationary. after that, they all started heading north in the same line that they came into existence in. while watching them slowly move north one of which went directly over my house completely silent!!! i noticed they were all traveling in an erratic fashion not in a straight line. slowly they all disappeared over the north mountains. i would like to mention that i am an aviation enthusiast and student pilot and know for a fact that this was nothing explainable by human technology. the way it all occurred, with the large pulsing red light changing courses and floating down south, and then the orderly appearance of these twinkling lights followed by erratic random movement and then orderly movement north, it seemed as if this was an operation or something that served a purpose, it was just a feeling i got while watching it.... still in somewhat of a state of shock.
content.summary: Large sequention red pulsing sphere then 8-10 pulsating crafts hover around red craft

content.detailedDescription: This sighting occurred between 11:00 and 11:30 above durango colorado's valley. i was watch tv when i saw the large red flashing craft come over the west mountains from west to east, then after coming over the valley the craft looked lower than i initially thought, it changed course to south east and seemed to be dropping in altitude. it went out of sight after it seemed to be slowing down. the truly humbling event occurred just after the flashing red thing went out of view and i looked up at several (8-10) twinkling lights that slowly got brighter from nothing at all in a straight line across the sky from west to east. once these objects got brighter i noticed that they were actually moving and not stationary. they began to converge in a un-orderly and random fashion directly over where i saw the red craft flying. for about two minutes these twinkling crafts floated around to my south view occasionally shooting in one direction and then turning around, some were just stationary. after that, they all started heading north in the same line that they came into existence in. while watching them slowly move north one of which went directly over my house completely silent!!! i noticed they were all traveling in an erratic fashion not in a straight line. slowly they all disappeared over the north mountains. i would like to mention that i am an aviation enthusiast and student pilot and know for a fact that this was nothing explainable by human technology. the way it all occurred, with the large pulsing red light changing courses and floating down south, and then the orderly appearance of these twinkling lights followed by erratic random movement and then orderly movement north, it seemed as if this was an operation or something that served a purpose, it was just a feeling i got while watching it.... still in somewhat of a state of shock.
content.summary: Large sequention red pulsing sphere then 8-10 pulsating crafts hover around red craft

content.detailedDescription: Visually observed a large object passing overhead from straight west to east during the very dark night because of large reddish/yellow or reddish/orange lights. because if appeared close to the ground in proximity for the size of its shape in the night sky, i stopped my car and got out. i stood and watched it pass overhead at a very low rate of speed. the shape was of a very large triangle object with a pattern of lights under the craft which neither pulsed or blinked. the distance in the dark from where i stood to where the object passed overhead was hard to discern but was far too low to be any kind of large commercial aircraft in a flight path to sioux falls, sd airport. it was moving west to east at a very slow speed. as i was just outside the place i work to watch a couple hot air balloons pass by i would estimate that the rate it passed overhead to be 2-3 times the air speed of a hot air balloon. i stood until the object passed nearly out of sight heading toward the iowa border. i was neither scared or amazed at this, although it never sped up or slowed down during the entire event and as i said was far to close in proximity to the ground to have proceeded north toward the airport in sioux falls. that, of course, is just my humble opinion. i have spent a couple occasions looking at various ufo sightings for iowa and places in the u.S. and some ot the pictures of triangle shaped objects with lights are very similar to what i observed. don't really know why i have not reported seeing  this until now, except that i am 62 years old and i have seen alot in this world anyway. thanks for your consideration.
content.summary: Object passed overhead on way to work in canton, sd early a.M.

content.detailedDescription: I woke to two entities grabbing me by my arms. one on the left to which i was fighting with and telling it to go away. i tried to focus on its face but was a blur except that it had a large bald head and was very tall with long thin legs and arms and it was grey.I was in my room and then on a table in a domed place and the other entity was towards a table with its back towards me. it was tall big bald head long grey thin arms and legs. it came towards me with something in its hands and it made me inhale it even though i tried to hold my breath i could not. they held me by my arms and i was walking inside a dome place and on the walls were panels of blinking lights and many beings walking left and right like a corridor. as i got close enough to pass them one turned and looked at me. it looked human but something about the eyes told me it was not and i woke up in my room with panic and fear. took me a while to realize i was home and i could not fall back to sleep.  this is the second abduction i have reported to mufon. if i have had others... i can not remember. one thing im sure about i was not dreaming i was im my room and they have some control over me but im still aware. the scary thing is that they can come when they want to and what they are doing to me i wish i knew but its against my will. they do exist
content.summary: Inside, dome with panels of blinking lights all around them.

content.detailedDescription: i had took a video a few minutes before i took this video. on the other video i got a video of a ufo/ object around the sun. i decided to take another one and got these objects. the first one seems to come out from behind the clouds. i don't know if it is one object or two together. like the other video you will have to take it frame by frame because it is very hard to see because it is so fast.
content.summary: Ufo/ objects flying near the sun

content.detailedDescription: i had took a video a few minutes before i took this video. on the other video i got a video of a ufo/ object around the sun. i decided to take another one and got these objects. the first one seems to come out from behind the clouds. i don't know if it is one object or two together. like the other video you will have to take it frame by frame because it is very hard to see because it is so fast.
content.summary: Ufo/ objects flying near the sun
Me an mother were driving and is zoomed past we did not see it but it vanished

content.detailedDescription: i was out trying to take pictures of the sun. so i decided to just take a video of the sun because i have seen alot of videos that supposedly have nibru in them. i never noticed what was on this video until i watched it on my digital camera. the ufo or object starts to appear on this video as soon as i start recording. it starts to appear on the left bottom of the screen on the video. i don't know where it came from or what it is doing but it looks like it is just circling around and around the sun. you will have to look at this frame by frame because it is so fast.
content.summary: Ufo/ object flying around and near the sun

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:15 pm thursday april 19,2012
my roommate and i saw strange light patterns in the west/southwest sky.
we live in a small town in yavapai county,az near prescott,az
we were sitting in the back yard with the dogs,i looked over towards the neighbors to our west.I saw a bright light in the sky just behind their place towards 89 highway.At first i thought it was lights maybe from a car or a house but it was too high up in the sky also there are no towers are anything that direction.
it looked like a solid light bar rectangular in shape it flashed on for about 5 seconds then went dark.I asked my friend did you see that?He said no.I pointed towards the sky where i saw the light then all of a sudden we both saw two sets of lights but they were a few hundred feet to the left of the first sighting and a few hundred feet higher.These lights were like two huge four bulb vanity lights side by side with a dark space between them.Eight lights total in this pattern.These lit up for about 10 seconds and the where gone.There were no aircraft in the area that i know of and we did not hear any noises.This was my first sighting,i always thought ufos were a hoax.This was real!
content.summary: We took the dogs outside last night around 9:15pm when we saw strange lights appear over the tree to the west..

content.detailedDescription:
Time: 9:00 pm
date: 4-16-2012
location: weslake, louisiana (west side)
conditions: night time with very thick and low rain clouds.
note: all photo and video times are shown 1 hour earilier. (did not reset for daylight savings time).

stepped out on the front porch to catch some fresh air and noticed a large white bright light directly west/slightly south west. first thought was, "wow, venus is really hugh looking tonight"! object looked at least 20 times larger than venus, then noticed it was slowly moving south. then realized it was pretty low because it was below the low cloud deck. second thought, "it's a large aircraft with landing lights on?". due to the slow speed moving across the sky to my left, it just looked too slow to be a jet. watched the object for a minute or so, until my view was blocked by a tree a hundred yards down the street. at this time, i went inside and retrieved my binoculars and video camera.

when i returned, the object was in a space between two trees. i looked at the object with binoculars and saw the most beautiful object that i have ever seen in my life! the object appeared to be about a mile away and was huge. it was at least twice the size of two 747's, and possibly 10 times larger! the best i can describe it in real time is that it looked like a giant atom. at least, what a picture of an atom looks like. it had a hugh bright white light center that looked like a ball of energy. around the middle, moved rapidly moving red lights that gave the object a saucer appearance. however, no structure could be seen between the "nucleus and the outer band" of red lights. even more to the atom appearance, were more random lights flying around the nucleus at 30 degree angles to the more prominate center band of red lights. then, between the "nucleus and electrons" was a bluest electrical "field". not sure what a "force field" would look like, but guess would have looked like one.

started videotaping with my sony camcorder just before the object went behind a second tree. at this time, i jumped in my truck and headed west toward the object. never saw the object again, but proceeded to the area where it was last viewed and found myself at the entergy power plant on houston river road west of westlake.

will send freeze frame photos of the object taken with my phone on a tv screen until i can transfer the video to the internet. the video is much better. the red outer lights moving around the center are hard to see in the photos.
content.summary: Looked like a giant "atom" with bright white glowing nucleus and obiting red lights with a blue electron field surrounding atom.

content.detailedDescription: On april 9, 2012 at 2140 hours i was driving the patrol vehicle around the property when i notice a bright light that risen from the tree tops. when the light moved it would brighten. and when it stopped it would go completly dim, so all you coould see is a black mass outline of the object. i followed the object for about 2 miles until it head east of the james river. no video or picture of the object. as much as i see these ufo's i wil start to carry a video camera at work.
content.summary: Surry power station

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up around 2:50am and went outside to smoke a cig and seen an orange orb hovering in the sky. between two power lines i seen it's changing it's direction, when i would stare at it for more than 10 seconds i felt faint and confused. like as if i was high so then i woke up my mother and told to take a look, cause i was starting to think i was crazy, but she saw it too.
i have binocs but i can't seem to find it when i look into them, seems only can be seen with the naked eyes

it's now 3:20 and still in the sky as of right now
content.summary: Orange orb

content.detailedDescription: First ufo i spotted in night ski over morgan hill. i have been watching for months as that the sky is really dark here. this is no joke kids. just saw this 10 minutes ago. sandie my wife came out and saw this too. it was amazing. i have great video of this event.
content.summary: First ufo i spotted in night ski over morgan hill. i have been watching for months as that the sky is really dark here. this is no joke kids. just saw this 10 minutes ago. sandie came out and saw this too. it was amazing. i have great video of this event.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just moved my pickup to the north side of my drive to allow room for my son to park when he arrived. i have a pair of 10 x 50 binoculars i keep in the truck , and had had them out  earlier in the day.
 
when i moved the truck i placed the caps back on them (binoculars) and put them back into their case , and laid them in the passenger seat. once the truck was parked i exited the truck walking behind it to avoid a muddy spot located at the front of the truck. after coming around the rear of the truck i was facing east , and noticed two very bright lights.

 at first glace i thought they were stars but quickly noticed they were moving from southeast to northwest. it proceeded to go behind some low clouds and i lost sight of it. i grabbed the 10x50 binoculars i had just put away and when the craft exited the clouds again i was able to get a good look at it. it had a strange light configuration with three unevenly placed lights on the leading end and two small dim lights located at what i believe was the tip of the wing ( or the two rear points of the triangle shape) no tail light was visable at anytime. located near center mass was a large ruby colered light that did not flash or blink at anytime.

i was able to get a freind to come out and see the object before it slipped behind the cloud bank and was out of sight. their was absolutely no noise coming from the craft. my freind is former military , and estimated it to be not more than 20,000 feet up. also their was a small prop driven plane passing to the northeast at the time of the sighting. i could hear its engines , but they werent that loud due to the distance it was from my location.
content.summary: Lage triangle caft with very odd light configuration and a large ruby colored light center mass

content.detailedDescription:
On 4/15/12, sunday morning, i was taking pictures of the cold front as it blew in because when it started, the clouds were verticle. tonight, i noticed this object in one of the pictures that i took that morning. this is the only picture with the yellow object that i never saw with my own eye. i tend to think that it is a frisbee, but even at the angle that it is , you should see some roundness to it. so it makes no sense to me.  can someone figure out what it is or how big it may be?


the yellow object is kind of centered in the sky.
content.summary: Unidentifiable yellow object in picture.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work headed south on hwy 231 and was on an open stretch just north of fayetteville, tn on hwy 231.  the object was just suddenly above some houses east of hwy 231 and moved over the power lines next to the highway and then hovered spotlighted me. i looked around an saw i was the only one on the road at the time in either direction as i got closer it turned the spotlight off and just hovered there. i just kept driving and it didn't move i drove under it and i wa about 30 feet long with a cigar like shape. after i passed it i slowed down some and when i hit my brakes it flashed a smaller white light at me a few times. so i tried to ignore this and went to work where i filed this report. i had also seen this object a few days before on the same road at about the same time except it was spotlighting a semi truck yard just south of petersburg, tn but it was at a distance and gone before i got to it so i figured it may have been a helicopter even though we rarely see them since we are so rural. i wasn't coolheaded enough to think to take a pic or video with my phone but since it seems to be visiting the area i may see it again and i will take video next time. i just don't know how to explain what this was it was maybe five to ten feet above the power lines and not moving in any direction at all, it made no sound and was about thirty feet in length with a solid green light on each end of the cigar shape and a red flashing light that was randomly flashing at about the center of the craft i have no idea where the spotlight came from but the small white light the flashed was next to the red light.
content.summary: Was on my way to work and got spotlighted!

content.detailedDescription: Driving home at night with nobody else on the road. we saw 2 bright white lighted shaped sphere objects that were hovering over us. they started moving together and then one just took off and disappeared. the other one started moving farther away and it looked like it changed color to a  faded yellow color then it took off and disappeared in thin air also.
content.summary: 2 sphered lights hovering and then disapperared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work, the usual route down the nj turnpike to 78.  this route takes me right passed newark airport.  each day i drive under scads of planes coming in and out of newark, so i rarely pay attention.  route 78 runs east-west and as i was merging onto 78 west i notice a large gray object west of newark airport.  at first, i didn't pay much attention because of the constant plane traffic.  however, i quickly realized that this was strange because plane traffic at newark typically flows north-south, so i looked at the object more closely.  it was about 1-2 miles (estimate) from the airport to west.  i was actually talking to a friend of mine on the phone so i looked at my cell phone log when i entered the date & time above.  i noticed it for about 2 minutes, it really didn't seem to move, i didn't see any lights.  then my view became blocked by an underpass and then by some trees, after all of the objects in my view cleared i no longer saw this object in the sky.  the next day i did a google search for ufo & newark but didn't see any recent sightings.
content.summary: Gray object near newark, nj

content.detailedDescription:
There have been multiple objects that are glowing and changing colors and they are moving/dancing around. i have one terrible camera and the batteries went dead plus the card is full.

my wife called me outside around 10:20 cst and was amazed. she pointed to a twinkling like star object, but it was moving all over the place. since then i have left and went to a better vantage point were i saw several of these. i even saw one appear closer to us out of nothing and start dancing around and doing circles like a light bug but big as a star.

i should also note that when my wife brought it to my attention, there was a huge white star that looked as big as a planet and was very low in the sky to the east of this dancing/color changing object and by the time i went upstairs to get my vivicam, it was gone...No where in sight, seriously, we looked for it everywhere and it still has not showed back up to this very minute. whatever it was, i believe it was associated with this original glowing/dancing star, but disappeared and has not been seen again.

i've even tracked these dancers from where they start by a tree top and see that they wind up well to the west or east of it. one of them was puling a smaller white star with it and seemed to line up in place with another star. the other two were stationary, but this one danced around. i give you my human word this is the truth and i would never make something like this up, it has been a real light show tonight, i had many ewww and ahhhh moments from these objects making maneuvers. 

y'all...We are not alone, those lights tonight were intelligent, and i'm amazed with a healthy fear of the unknown. i just got back in from viewing again. one is still out there thrashing about as i type. i watched it dance behind the tree line, rise back above it, i just don't know what to say...I know this really sucks, but the little camera i have really isn't worth a toot, and trust me, i plan on getting a good one asap because if would have had a good one i would be uploading the best evidence i've ever seen myself, for that all i can do is apologize and tell ya i'm getting a trustworthy video camera asap.

i saw smaller lights appear out of nothing from bigger ones...I saw shooting stars right beside the area where these lights were doing there dance...I felt like i had a measure of influence on them appearing "whether that be wishful thinking or not i don't know,"

the one fact i keep going back to when i'm trying to deal with what all i have seen tonight is the huge bright star that was so low, so bright, so huge, so close to the first dancing light we witnessed, and the fact that it completely disappeared without a trace shortly after this first light showed up gives this all a huge measure of validity in my mind while going through the stages of disbelief even when i know in my heart and mind what i have witnessed tonight.

another thing, most of these lights when they would make a sudden or big maneuvers they would get brighter, twinkle brighter, or change colors. i'm shocked y'all..I never thought i would see something like this and i have to wonder if something big is coming if i'm seeing it out in the open with such conviction, or if i just got lucky.

  i would love to hear from anyone else who witnessed these last night as well, and get their perspectives.  

  also, i have no idea what kind of blue and red images my little camera picked up, but they only showed up when the ufo/ufo's were present.  additionally, my camera froze at 7:16 and would not respond to anything until i took the batteries out when filming from upstairs window.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Saw pulsating star like light noticed huge and bright  white star to east of it very low to the ground, big star disappeared shortly after never to be seen again but the little lights stayed, dancing off and on for 5 hours

content.detailedDescription:
I was young 7 or 8 years old, i was supposed to be asleep but i had crept into my older brothers room, and he was looking out his bedroom window, (towards the aberdeen proving ground). we both had a feeling like we had to look out the window, because there was something we had to see.
the object resembled a small pyramid, with four lights on the bottom at each of the corners. it was red in color with strange designs wrapping around it. the object was around four ft tall and four feet ft in width and length. it was spinning the way a top would spin. the craft fell from the sky so fast it seemed to appear, nearly 20 ft away from the window. i guess you could say the craft "flew" to the window perhaps 2 or 3 ft away from my brother and myself, then took off almost like a u turn. we both jumped away from the window terrified and have rarely spoken of the incident since. a friend i have spoken to about this told me of the mufon website and said that i should report the incident, even though it happened more then ten years ago.
content.summary: Small craft came to my bedroom window then took off.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my driveway talking to a friend who was sitting in her car with the door open. it was approximately 7;00 pm, it had been raining somewhat ( but not at the time of this event )  and there were thunderstorms in the area.  i heard, from behind me, what i thought was a bird fluttering in the tree that kind of sounded like electrical crackling also. the tree was about 15 ft behind where i was standing. i turned around to look at what was causing the noise. as i turned a white ball came out of the tree and traveled away from us at a very great rate speed across the street over the house across the street and disappeared from sight. there was a definite curvature to its flight path as it flew away as it looked to avoid the trees across the street. the person who i was talking to also witnessed this event. i have never seen anything like it before or since. the entire event lasted no more than 15 seconds. i got a little excited and asked my friend if she had seen it and she said that she had and we wondered what the heck it was. at the time i wrote it off to ball lightning as i had heard it can occur when thunderstorms are around but was watching your today ( 4/19/12 ) show about orbs and it reminded me of this event.
content.summary: I heard what i thought was fluttering or crackling in the tree behind me. turned around to see orb take off from tree.

content.detailedDescription: Black tiangle shape, white lights in corners, red pulsating light in underside center / humming, low rumble sound. first seen higher, under cloud deck flying slowly sw to ne. saw again later in evening. much lower.. few hundred feet over tree tops going e to w slow speed but it was slowlw spinning counter clockwise as it flew. same humming / low rumble
content.summary: Black tiangle shape, white lights in corners, red pulsating light in underside center / humming, low rumble sound

content.detailedDescription: Noticed these objects after the fact in photograph. sending 2 photographs, one with the objects one without to compare. taken aprox. 15 to 20 seconds appart
content.summary: 4 or 5 dark objects

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1) what is the make and model of the camera used to take the photos?

the camera i used to take the photos was a sony cyber-shot with a 12x optical zoom model number: dsc-h2 digital still camera.

2) what was the camera setting used?

the setting was the auto adjustment setting.

3) did you actually see the object or was it just noticed in the photos?

i saw the object myself prior to taking the photos. the object was closer and larger before i went inside to grab my camera. the shape had not changed when i returned, however the object had moved slightly and was farther away. i saw the object through my viewfinder and after i downloaded the pictures onto my computer as well. the photos represent the same shape and color of the object i saw with my own eyes.

4) where was the exact location on the coast where you took the photos?

the exact location where the photos were taken is high rock terrace in gloucester, massachusetts. it is right on the water on long beach in gloucester.

5) were there other people and activities going on in the area at this time?

the photo was taken in the summer so there were people on the beach at the time. the beach was not particularly crowded and i was taking the photos on my deck away from the people on the beach. my deck is approximately 4 to 5 stories higher than the ground level of the beach. the object itself was not located over the beach but rather over my home which is on a small peninsula.

6) in what direction did you see the object?

i saw the object approach from the right side of my home, the west side, although i did not see it's origin. i saw it as it was approaching my location. it definitely had directionality and control. 

7) in what direction was the object travelling?

it hovered over my location for a period of time and then headed on an easterly path towards the open ocean. as the object made its way from west to east it appeared to get farther away from the ground, as if it was ascending into the sky.

8) what is the estimated speed of the object?

it was slow moving, slower than a small plane, but faster than a balloon or kite floating. it was within my field of vision for approximately 30 minutes. it was very smooth in its trajectory with no wobbling at all.

9) how far above the horizon  did the object appear t be?

when i first spotted the object it was closer to the ground. it was about as high as a large bird might fly, definitely no higher than a mile off of the ground. as it headed east it continued to get higher on the horizon and smaller as if moving upwards rather than away from me.

10) what object, i.E...A penny, dime, quarter held at arms length would compare to the size of the object?

initially the object was about the size of my thumb nail if my arm was fully extended. as i mentioned the object appeared smaller as it moved away from me. it gradually got smaller and smaller until i could no longer see it. at the time the photos were taken the object had reached the size of the head of a q-tip if extended at arms length.

11) were you able to visually see this "morphing?

yes, i saw the object both with the naked eye and through my viewfinder appear to bend in shape and then return back to its original hollow "donut" shape. the object, when close appeared to be more of a hollow hexagon or octagon with clear edges and a hollow interior. the shape, when close, was easier to observe and there were clear walls on each side of the hollow hexagonal or octagonal cylinder.

12) did the object seem to reflect light?

the object was matte black with no lights and no reflective surfaces. i also saw no windows. 

13) were there any other witnesses besides yourself?

my mother, who was on the deck at the time, was also there to witness the object.

14) what were you doing at the time of the sighting?

i had gone onto the deck to check on my father who was taking a nap when i saw the object hovering off on the west side. i watched it for a while before going inside to grab my camera.

15) how did you first notice the object?

i caught it in my field of vision off the side of my home. i didn't draw attention to it, but i did call for my mother to come and witness it.

16) when and how did you lose sight of the object?

i watched the object for as long as possible. i was taking pictures as it was slowly ascending into the sky, eventually (not suddenly though) the object became too far away for me to see.

17) did you notice anything else in the sky like aircraft, birds etc...At the time?

no, although there was some cloud cover.
content.summary: Matte black six to eight sided donut shaped ufo spotted in gloucester ma in june 2011

content.detailedDescription: I am looking for some answers or information regarding pictures i've taken of the sun, and what appears to be black objects that stay near the sun. i've taken several different pictures over the last week, between 4/15 to present, at different times and different locations. the objects number from one to over twenty in the various pictures, and i don't know if this is a flaw in my phone's camera, or if i'm actually seeing objects near the sun. i'd like someone to look at the pictures i've taken and please give me some feedback. we have been seeing unidentified things in the sky very regularly and i'm curious. thanks!
content.summary: Objects appearing in front of the sun

content.detailedDescription: I did,t have my glasses on but could normally that a plane was a plane if it flew by. what i saw was shaped like a plane but very blurry as if it was a cloud. didn't want to lose track of it trying to find my glasses. it travel the speed of a normal plane but with all the squinting i did, i couldn't make it out.  it was traveling due south over the 11203 zip code. one thing i know for sure is that it wasn't a rouge cloud.
content.summary: Cloud like plane
